column1: Verse Text

Gonya Jesu akikwatya kunena nao na mafumbo akiamba, “Kwere kuna mut'u mumwenga ariyerima mundawe akiulaya mizabibu, akiudengelezera wiyo, akitsimba wina wa kukamulira zabibu, kidza akiaka uringo wa kurindira. Kugonya vizho, wo munda akiukodishira ak'urima, ye mwenye achenda ts'i nyingine.
Makathi ga mavuno garihofika akihuma muhumikiwe ende kwa aryahu ak'urima, akagerwe fungu ra zo zabibu.
Ye muhumiki arihofika, o ak'urima makimuhala makimupiga, gonya makimuja kihuhu.
Kuona vizho, ye mut'u akihuma muhumiki mungine. Iye naye makimwangiza ranga ra kitswa na makimuhendera makuruhu.
Akihuma mungine, na o ak'urima makihenda kumwalaga kamare, na angine anji mariohumwa mapigwa na angine makilagwa.
“Vikara ariyekala asere wa kumuhuma were ni mumwenga thu. Naye were ni mwanawe mwenye amuhendzaye. Bai akimuhuma akale wa mwisho, akiamba kimoyo-moyo, ‘Bila shaka mandamuishimu.’
“Ela o ak'urima marihomona ye mwana, makiambirana, ‘Yuno be hatha se andiyeuhala ufwa uno munda? Alume nahumwalage yuyu, na uu munda undakala wehu.’
Bai makimugwavukira makimwalaga, gonya makimwamboza ndze ya wo munda.
“Vidze munaona ye mwenye munda andahendadze?” Jesu akienderera kuamba, “Ye mwenye munda andakudzaalaga o ak'urima na wo munda aap'e at'u angine.
Vidze k'amudzagashoma gano Maoro gaambago,
Ut'u uwo wahendwa ni Bwana,
Marihosikira vizho o athumia a Kiyahudi makijeza kumugwira Jesu, kwani mamanya kukala ro fumbo ridzanenwa kwao ao, ela makigoha wo muthunganano wa o at'u. Kwa vizho makimuricha makihauka.
Ndo gonya makiahuma angine kahi za o Mafarisayo na at'u a Herode, mende makamuhege na maswali.

Hatha marihofika makimwamba, “Mwalimu, hunamanya kukala uwe u mujeri. K'ugoha mut'u yoyosi hatha kala ana cheo chani, mana k'ulola at'u kwa uso. Unafundisha ngira ya Mulungu jeri. Bai fwambire. Kuriha kodi kwa Kaisari ni karakara hedu si karakara?”
Jesu akikumanya kare ko kudzihendya kwao, akiamba, “Kwanoni munanijeza? Nip'ani yo p'esa hedu niilole.”
Bai makiireha na makimup'a Jesu. Na Jesu akiuza akiamba, “Ino sura iriyo hano na ro dzina ni zha h'ani?” Makiamba, “Ni zha Kaisari.”
Jesu akiambira, “H'aya bai, zha Kaisari mup'eni Kaisari mwenye, na zha Mulungu nazho mup'eni Mulungu.” Nao machangalazwa zhomu ni zho arizhodzigidzya.
Gonya Masadukayo ambao manaamba k'akuna kufufuka makimudzirira Jesu makiamba,
“Mwalimu, Musa wafuorera kukala, mut'u akifwererwa ni nduguye, na akisiya muche ela asisiye ahoho, ye nduguye mut'u ni amuhale ufwa ili amuzhalire ahoho ye mufwadzi.
Vikara kwere kuna ndugu afungahe, ye mukulu wao akihala muche, ela akifwa bila kuzhala naye.
Ye wa hiri akimuhala, naye akifwa bila kusiya ahoho, na wa hahu naye dzazho.
Osi afungahe makigoma kufwa bila kusiya ahoho. Mwisho ye muche naye akiathuwa.
Vidze makathi at'u mandihofufuka, andakala mukaza h'ani? Kwani o ndugu osi afungahe mamuhala.”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Ndo sababu munahenda makosa, kwa kukala k'amumanya Maoro, kidza k'amumanya nguvu za Mulungu zirizho.
Kwani wakathi at'u mandihofufuka kundakala k'akuna kuhala hedu kuhalwa, kwani mandakala here malaika a mulunguni.

Bai dzulu za at'u kufufuka, naamba, k'amudzashoma kahi za chuwo cha Musa dzulu za kitsakuzi kirichokala kinaaka na viryahu Mulungu arizhonena na Musa akiamba, ‘Ndimi Mulungu wa Burahemu, na Isaka, na Jakobu’?
Vivi vinanyesa kukala Mulungu ni Mulungu wa at'u mario moyo si wa at'u mariofwa. Ninwi Masadukayo munakosa sana.”

Bai mumwenga wa aryahu a alimu a Sheria were a haho na akisikira zho marizho were manauza-uza na akimanya kamare kukala Jesu adzadzigidzyat'o. Kwa vizho naye akimuza rakwe akiamba, “Amuri ya kwandza ya zosi ni hiyo?”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Bomu ni ii iambayo, ‘Sirikizani h'enwi Aiziraeli, Bwana wehu Mulungu ni mumwenga na nde Bwana h'akeye.
Muhendze Bwana Mulunguo na moyowo wosi, na rohoro rosi, na akilizo zosi, na nguvuzo zosi.’
Amuri ya hiri ni ii, ‘Muhendze mwandziyo here udzihendzazho mwenye.’ K'akuna amuri bomu kukira zizi mbiri.”
Ye mwalimu wa Sheria akimwamba, “Udzadzigidzyat'o mwalimu. U mujeri here udzizhoamba kwamba Mulungu ni mumwenga na k'akuna mungine hasihokala iye.
Na mut'u ni amuhendze na moyowe wosi na akilize zosi na nguvuze zosi na aahendze andziye dza zho adzihendzazho mwenye. Kugwira malagizo gaga kudzakira kumboza sadaka za kuocha na nyingine-nyingine.”
Jesu arihomona kukala ye mwalimu wa Sheria adzadzigidzyat'o kilachu, akimwamba, “Uwe k'ukure na uthawali wa Mulungu.” Bada ya gago k'ahakalireho na mut'u ariyedzisikira amuze swali.
Badaye Jesu arihokala anafundisha kahi za ro Hekalu, waauza swali o at'u akiamba, “Alimu a Sheria manadimadze kuamba kukala ye Masihi ni Mwana wa Daudi?
Daudi mwenye kahi za nguvu za Roho Mweri waamba,
Vikikala Daudi mwenye amwiha ‘Bwana,’ anadimadze kukala mwanawe?” Bai wo muthunganano mubomu ukimusirikiza na raha zhomu.
Jesu arihokala anafundisha waamba, “Dzimanyirireni na alimu a Sheria mahendzao kutsembera kuno madzavala miguwo mire kwamba malamuswe kwa ishima mo masokoni,
na kidza manahendza kugerwa vihi zha mbere kahi za masinagogi na kahi za sherehe.
Kidza ao nikuahoka ache magungu vit'u zhao, na kudzihendesha kukala ni adzo kwa kuvoya mavoyo mare-mare. Adhabu yao indakala k'ali zaidhi.”
Gonya Jesu achenda kahi za ro Hekalu na achendakelesi hehi na cho kiya cha kwangizira sadaka na akilolera viryahu at'u magwagazho p'esa. Vikara akiona mashaha managwaga nyinji-nyinji.
Na hakidza mwanamuche ariye were ni gungu kidza mukiya na akigwaga vipeni viri.
Jesu akiaiha hamwenga o anafundzie na akiambira, “Namwambira ujeri, yuyu mwanamuche gungu adzagwaga nyinji kukira osi.
Mana o angine madzamboza kafungu thu ka wo ushaha mario nao, ela yuno ye, ni masikini nyasi, ela adzagwaga zhosi arizho nazho. Adzamboza zhosi arizho were angaishira.”
